mapper.sql: id, user_id, addr_id, is_zt, amount, pay_status, pay_type, order_status, express_name, express_code, remark, created, modified, deleted
mapper.select: SELECT orders.id, orders.amount, orders.pay_status, orders.pay_type, orders.order_status,orders.express_name, orders.express_code, orders.remark, orders.created, users.loginname, users.nickname, address.recipients, address.mobile, address.country, address.province, address.city, address.county, address.detail, address.zipcode FROM (st_orders orders) LEFT JOIN st_users users ON orders.user_id = users.id LEFT JOIN st_order_addresses address ON address.id = orders.addr_id WHERE orders.id = #{oid}
mapper.insert:
insert into st_orders
id,
user_id,
addr_id,
is_zt,
amount,
pay_status,
pay_type,
order_status,
express_name,
express_code,
remark,
created,
modified,
deleted,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isZt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{amount,jdbcType=REAL},
#{payStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
#{payType,jdbcType=BIT},
#{orderStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
#{expressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expressCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{deleted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update st_orders
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_zt = #{isZt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=BIT},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
express_name = #{expressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_code = #{expressCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update st_orders set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_zt = #{isZt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=BIT}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, express_name = #{expressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_code = #{expressCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
